p: Ripe fruits of L. kerstingii (30 kg) were collected at Djanga (latitude 10.37 N; longitude 4.47 W) in the Sudanian climatic zone (70–90 rainy days with 900–1200 mm) in southwest Burkina Faso in June 2012 and 2014. A voucher specimen (specimen number 496) was deposited in the herbarium of the University Ouaga I Pr Joseph KI-ZERBO (OUA).
